attributes.action: Stiff sentencing and community service for all rioters who are destroying our communities and our country.
attributes.additional_details:
The damage caused by rioters affects us all, many people have lost their livelihoods.  This petition calls for stiffer sentencing and then community service to rebuild the areas they have destroyed for all rioters regardless of their age or whether its a first conviction.

Parents should also be held accountable for their children's actions and be made to do community service in the areas destroyed as well.
